attributes.name: RouterService
attributes.description:
The Router service is the public API that provides component/view layer
access to the router.

methods.description:
Transition the application into another route. The route may
be either a single route or route path:

See [Route.transitionTo](https://emberjs.com/api/classes/Ember.Route.html#method_transitionTo) for more info.
methods.name: transitionTo

params.name: routeNameOrUrl
params.description: the name of the route or a URL

params.name: models
params.description:
the model(s) or identifier(s) to be used while
  transitioning to the route.

params.name: options
params.description:
optional hash with a queryParams property
  containing a mapping of query parameters

return.description:
the transition object associated with this
  attempted transition

methods.description:
Transition into another route while replacing the current URL, if possible.
The route may be either a single route or route path:

See [Route.replaceWith](https://emberjs.com/api/classes/Ember.Route.html#method_replaceWith) for more info.
methods.name: replaceWith

params.name: routeNameOrUrl
params.description: the name of the route or a URL

params.name: models
params.description:
the model(s) or identifier(s) to be used while
  transitioning to the route.

params.name: options
params.description:
optional hash with a queryParams property
  containing a mapping of query parameters

return.description:
the transition object associated with this
  attempted transition

methods.description: Generate a URL based on the supplied route name.
methods.name: urlFor

params.name: models
params.description:
the model(s) or identifier(s) to be used while
  transitioning to the route.

params.name: options
params.description:
optional hash with a queryParams property
  containing a mapping of query parameters

return.description: the string representing the generated URL

methods.description: Determines whether a route is active.
methods.name: isActive

params.name: models
params.description:
the model(s) or identifier(s) to be used while
  transitioning to the route.

params.name: options
params.description:
optional hash with a queryParams property
  containing a mapping of query parameters

return.description: true if the provided routeName/models/queryParams are active
